sentences.en: Do you know who broke the thermometer?
sentences.cn: 你知道那温度计是哪个打破的 吗 ?

sentences.en: Either measure the temperature with a bath thermometer or test the water with your wrist.
sentences.cn: 要么用浴用温度计测量水温，要么用手腕试一下。

sentences.en: It is essential that you are able to read a thermometer.
sentences.cn: 最基本的是要能看懂温度计。

sentences.en: She put the thermometer in his mouth.
sentences.cn: 她把体温表放入他口中.

sentences.en: The mercury in thermometer mounted up [ rose ] to 35℃.
sentences.cn: 温度计的 水银柱 升到摄氏35度.

sentences.en: The nurse shook the thermometer and put it under my armpit.
sentences.cn: 护士把体温计甩了甩，然后放到了我的腋下。

sentences.en: The thermometer fell to zero last night.
The thermometer nudged three figures yesterday in Rome.
sentences.cn: 罗马昨天气温接近（华氏）三位数。

sentences.en: The thermometer reached the minimum for the year.
sentences.cn: 寒暑表已降到当年的最低记录.
温度计显示高于100摄氏度。

sentences.en: The thermometer shows the temperature in Celsius and Fahrenheit.
sentences.cn: 这支温度计标有摄氏和华氏两种温度。

words.tran_cn: 温度记录器；[仪] 热录像仪
[仪] 温度记录；[印刷] 热熔印刷
温度测量；温度测定法；[物] 计温学
[解剖] 温度感受器；热感受器
[自] 温度调节器；[仪] 调温器

phrases.tran_cn: 红外测温仪；红外线温度计

trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment that measures the temperature of the air, of your body etc
